name: MERRILL LYNCH, PIERCE, FENNER & SMITH, INC., et al., petitioners, v. Greg MANNING, et al.

opinions.text: Motion of Securities Industry and Financial Markets Association for leave to file a brief as amici curiaegranted. Petition for a writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit granted.
